packages.description: Hang'n Out with Celebrity is a program specially designed for people to HANGOUT on vacation with their highly respected and favored Celebrities around the world. During these few days (as scheduled) selected Celebrity and secret admirers will have a great opportunity to Wine & Dine together, they will visit many interesting places together, take both personal and group photographs together, and many more. It is going to be an unforgettable experience for both Celebrities and their fans.

packages.name: Hang'n Out with Pastor (Dr) Shola Adeoye
packages.description:
Who is Dr. Shola? Dr. Shola Adeoye is a multi-talented professional with a diverse background in counseling, pastoral work, business, and IT. As a counselor, he has helped numerous individuals and families navigate various life challenges. In addition to his counseling work, Dr. Adeoye is also a respected pastor and spiritual leader, having served in various leadership capacities in his church for many years. He is known for his compassionate and practical approach to ministry, which has helped countless individuals find hope, healing, and meaning in their lives.

Beyond his work in counseling and pastoral ministry, Dr. Adeoye is also a successful businessman with a passion for entrepreneurship. He has founded several businesses over the years, including an IT consulting firm where he leverages his expertise in technology to help other businesses thrive in the digital age.

Dr. Adeoye is a devoted husband and father, and his family is at the center of his life. He is deeply committed to helping others achieve their full potential, both personally and professionally, and he is known for his unwavering integrity, kindness, and generosity of spirit.

packages.name: Niagara Fall
packages.description: If you think the Falls put on a show by day, wait until you see Niagara Falls at night. Niagara Falls' nightly illuminations transform the water wonder into a kaleidoscopic. Niagara Falls is in a public location on Niagara Parks land. It can be accessed for free 24/7 all year around. The surrounding attractions however need to be paid for. See a full list of free things to do in Niagara Falls here.

packages.name: Zanzibar Beach Resort, Tanzania
packages.description:
Zanzibar Beach Resort, Tanzania


Situated in Zanzibar City, 5.1 km from Peace Memorial Museum, Zanzibar Beach Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With free WiFi, this 3-star resort offers room service and a 24-hour front desk. Guests can enjoy African and Indian dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar.


At the resort the rooms come with air conditioning, a seating area, a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, a safety deposit box and a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries and a hairdryer. Zanzibar Beach Resort offers some units with sea views, and all rooms are fitted with a balcony. At the accommodation each room is fitted with bed linen and towels. Zanzibar Beach Resort offers a children's playground. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the resort.


There is also a business centre and a babysitting service on site. Hamamni Persian Baths is 6 km from Zanzibar Beach Resort, while St Joseph's Roman Catholic Cathedral is 6.2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Abeid Amani Karume International, 2 km from the accommodation, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

Distance in property description is calculated using © OpenStreetMap

destinations.name: Atlantis Paradise Island
destinations.description: "Atlantis Bahamas is a lush, oceanside resort located on Paradise Island in The Bahamas. The resort features five distinct hotels: the iconic The Royal, the laid-back The Beach, the multigenerational The Coral, the ultraluxury The Cove and the residential-style The Reef. Atlantis Bahamas showcases the world’s largest open-air marine habitat including Dolphin Cay dedicated to conservation, rehabilitation and education. Guest can also enjoy 141-acres of non-stop fun at Aquaventure water park, try their luck at the Atlantis Casino or enjoy various cuisines at local or celebrity chef restaurants. Experience stunning ocean views at the 18-hole par 72 championship Ocean Club Golf Course or get pampered at the Mandara Spa."
destinations.services: Aquaventure water park-Atlantis Casino-celebrity chef restaurants-ocean views at the 18-hole par 72 championship Ocean Club Golf Course-the Mandara Spa

destinations.name: Universe Orlando Resorts
destinations.description: Universal Orlando Resort doesn’t stop short when it comes to hosting spectacular events. There’s always something special for any park-goer, ranging from a Universal concert schedule to a Universal Harry Potter celebration schedule, and much more in between. So, if you want to see the ultimate 2024 Universal Studios calendar for the year, we’ve got you covered.
destinations.services: Rock The Universe-Mardi Gras-Halloween Horror Nights-Christmas at The Wizarding World of Harry Potter-Grinchmas

destinations.name: Little Palm Island Resort and Spa
destinations.description: Located off the fabled Florida Keys coastline, on a lush, private island dotted with crushed seashell paths amid verdant tropical foliage and exotic wildlife, rests Little Palm Island Resort & Spa – a destination like no other, a place where the sea dazzles and the beach beckons. A place so remote you can only reach it by sea-plane or boat. Paradise exists. Little Palm Island awaits.
destinations.locations: 1. Key West-2. The Hemingway Home and Museum-3. Seven Mile Bridge

destinations.name: Islamorada Florida
destinations.description: Islamorada is a tourism-oriented community an hour south of Miami consisting of four islands spanning 18 linear miles with a land area of approximately 3,900 acres. Known as the Sport Fishing Capital of the World, Islamorada is a popular vacation destination enjoyed for its up-scale small-town atmosphere, scenic bay, and ocean views, sunshine, boating, fishing, locally owned restaurants, quaint shops, and galleries.

destinations.name: Niagara Fall
destinations.description: A trip to Niagara Falls USA is about water, water and more water but there is so much more to see and do when you visit Niagara Falls and the surrounding region. You will want to stay for days and learn more about all the great attractions, hiking trails, restaurants, wineries, shopping, hotels and all that it has to offer.
destinations.locations: Rainbow Air-Seneca Niagara Resort & Casino-The Niagara Power Vista-Live On Air Falls View Balloon Ride-Rainforest Cafe-Castellani Art Museum of Niagara University

destinations.name: Margaritaville Lake Resort
destinations.description: You and your loved ones will have an unforgettable adventure at Margaritaville Lake Resort! "Gather your family, put on your flip-flops, and head to a family-friendly getaway you will never forget. With the shores of Lake Conroe as its backdrop, this resort offers an island vibe inspired by Jimmy Buffett in the heart of Texas. It’s a drivable escape for Texans to venture to paradise that’s close to the Houston area. This hidden gem is a perfect family destination to consider for Spring or Summer breaks" according to the website of enormous company.
destinations.services: MARGARITAVILLE LAKE RESORT DINING-LANDSHARK BAR & GRILL-LICENSE TO CHILL-JOLLY MON WATERPARK-The Lone Palm Pool Bar-5 o’Clock Somewhere Bar-ST. SOMEWHERE SPA-18-hole golf course-Mini golf, pickleball, and tennis courts-Einstein’s Party Barge Cruise

destinations.name: North Topsail Beach
destinations.description: North Topsail Beach is the perfect place to get away. The town’s motto - Nature’s Tranquil Beauty – says it all. From breathtaking sunrises to spectacular sunsets, from beautiful sandy beaches to maritime forests, North Topsail Beach truly is an island paradise. If you want to step back from the crowds, there’s plenty to do in North Topsail Beach. Along the shore you can stroll, sunbathe, swim, search for shells and ancient sharks’ teeth, go surfing and enjoy a plethora of watersports.

destinations.name: Ocean View Resort Campground
destinations.description: Located midway between Atlantic City and Cape May, Ocean View Resort is only three miles from the finest and safest beaches on the Atlantic Shore. Ocean View Resort Campground invites you to experience the finest in family camping at New Jersey's largest privately owned campground. Here on 180 wooded acres, you will love our spacious, shaded campsites and modern camping conveniences
destinations.locations: The Cape May Zoo-The Cape May Point Lighthouse-Atlantic City's dazzling shows and exciting casinos

destinations.name: Stonewall Resort, West Virginia
destinations.description: Stonewall Resort combines the pristine lake surroundings with all the comforts of home. In the midst of lush, rolling hills and tranquil lake waters, the beautiful Adirondack-style lodge offers a refreshing perspective, state-of-the-art conference facilities and a luxury resort experience. From the resort's own Mountain Laurel Spa, 374-slip boat marina and award-winning Arnold Palmer Signature Golf Course, you can enjoy a wide range of recreational activities.

destinations.name: Woodloch Resort, Pennsylvania
destinations.description: This exceptional four-season Poconos family resort nestled in a pristine mountain lake vacation setting is regarded as one of America's "Best Inclusive Family Resorts". Woodloch is a private own and managed facility. Its traditional warm hospitality has been nurturing and embracing the spirit of spending quality time with friends and family for nearly sixty years.

destinations.name: Fort Lauderdale Marriott Harbor Beach Resort & Spa
destinations.description: The Fort Lauderdale Marriott Harbor Beach Resort & Spa encompasses 16 acres of beachfront property in the exclusive Harbor Beach community and features more amenities than any other hotel in the area. As the closest beach resort to Fort Lauderdale International airport, we invite you to have your "toes in the sand" within minutes of deplaning. With an unmatched collection of culinary experiences, and an expansive variety of programming and activities, South Florida's largest private beach beckons you to its sparkling shores.
destinations.locations: Fort Lauderdale-Hollywood Internation Airport-G&B Oyster Bar-International Swimming Hall of Fame

destinations.name: Kalahari Resorts & Conventions - Poconos
destinations.description: African-themed Kalahari Resort and Conventions! Home to the East Coasts largest indoor waterpark at 200,000 sq. ft. and massive family entertainment center, Kalahari offers an unprecedented array of fun for the whole family! Kalahari also features nearly 1000 guestrooms and suites, the full-service Spa Kalahari and Salon, a fully-equipped fitness center, on-site restaurants and sweet treats, unique retail shops, and a 215,000 square feet of flexible meeting space at your disposal.
destinations.locations: The Frogtown Chophouse-Camelback Mountain Adventures-Big Pocono State Park
destinations.services: Pool-Mini Golf-Fitness centre-Lounge-Children activities-Restaurant and Bar-Shopping

destinations.name: Turf Valley Resort, Maryland
destinations.description: Turf Valley Resort is a relaxing destination for family getaways and corporate retreats. Surrounded by beautiful landscapes and many amenities that are located on the resort to include; golf courses, rejuvenating Spa, outdoor pool and an Alexandra’s American Fusion restaurant. Play and Relax at Turf Valley Resort, your Getaway on the Greens.
destinations.locations: Leelynn's Dining Room and Lounge-Centennial Park-Howard County Conservancy

destinations.name: Westgate Palace Hotel /Universal /I-Drive
destinations.description: Get your trip off to a great start with a stay at this property, which offers car park free of charge. Strategically situated in International Drive North - Universal, allowing you access and proximity to local attractions and sights. Don't leave before paying a visit to the famous Magic Kingdom Park. Rated with 4 stars, this high-quality property provides guests with access to restaurant, hot tub and fitness center on-site.

destinations.name: Zanzibar Beach Resort
destinations.description: Located in Zanzibar City near the beach, Zanzibar Beach Resort incorporates a blend of contemporary and Afro-Arabic designs in its architecture. The resort is 1.9 mi away from Zanzibar International Airport, Zanzibar Town is a 5-minute drive away. A buffet breakfast is served every day at Zanzibar Beach Resort. While the indoor dining Spice Restaurant specializes in African, Oriental and Indian cuisines, the Baobab restaurant serves continental dishes. Guests can also dine at the Seafood Restaurant that serves fresh sea catches or have a drink at the Discovery Bar that serves alcoholic and soft drinks as well as juices. The onsite Café Gold serves freshly ground coffee while the Pool Bar offers a selection of juices, soft and hard drinks.

events.name: Free Valentine Vacation for 2 Couple
events.description:
Free Vacation Trip To OmuCreek Resort, Lekki


Couples, are you ready for the Free vacation of a lifetime? Leisure Timez is giving two lucky couples the chance to enjoy a luxurious 3-day, 2-night adventure at the stunning OMU Resort in Lekki – absolutely FREE!" Picture this: exhilarating quad biking, thrilling paintball games, high-speed go-karting, serene boat cruises, and nights spent in a VIP hotel. Not to mention, you’ll indulge in mouthwatering, luxurious meals every step of the way! And the best part? You don’t pay a dime – no entry fees, no hidden costs. This dream vacation is on us, brought to you by Leisure Timez, your trusted vacation planner based in Spring, Texas


To grab this amazing opportunity, follow these six simple steps:

1. Email your names to leisuretime218@gmail.com. (Note-No z)

2. Join our exclusive WhatsApp group.

3. Subscribe and follow us on all our social media platforms.

4. Watch a few of our exciting videos on YouTube. - Leisure Timez

5. Create a short video with your spouse, summarizing the importance of vacations based on one of our videos.

6. Upload your video on all your social media platforms with the hashtags #leisuretimezfreecouplevacation2025 and tag us at @leisuretimez3 on Instagram 


Don’t miss this chance to create memories that’ll last a lifetime!


For more information, contact us at +1 346-372-2568, email us at info@leisuretimez.com, or visit our website at www.leisuretimez.com.

Follow us on YouTube, Facebook, Instagram, and TikTok @Leisure Timez
